introduction.overview: Highly motivated and detail-oriented Junior Frontend Developer specializing in React and Next.js, with hands-on experience building web applications.
introduction.achievements: Developed and delivered over 30 projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams.
introduction.passion: Passionate about transforming UX/UI designs into responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
introduction.growth: Dedicated to continuous growth through coding bootcamps and online courses.

frontend.heading: Why exactly frontend?
reasons: For me, frontend programming is like putting together a puzzle that awakens the childish side in me. It makes me think about how to arrange the segments of the web page.
Every frontend project is different, both in terms of appearance and functionality, so every time is a new challenge and experience. Never monotonous.
It's ideal for visual types like me.

learning.heading: Learning
reasons: For me, learning is a journey that never ends.
I strive for a deeper understanding so that I can become as good as possible.
I enthusiastically accept the challenges that the future holds and work passionately to build the foundation for my career in the world of frontend development.

book.title: Reading books
book.paragraph: I like reading books on psychology the most because they enlighten me and open a new perspective on things.

nature.title: Nature
nature.paragraph: From walking in nature, which is relaxing for body and soul, to exploring hidden places.

plants.title: Plants
plants.paragraph: Succulents cultivation. The more unusual they are, the more interesting they are.
